CBS: In note, Dzhokhar called Tamerlan a martyr

CBS News correspondent John Miller reported this morning that according to sources, Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev wrote a note while inside the Watertown boat he used to hide from police. In the note, Miller reports, Tsarnaev referred to the Boston victims as "collateral damage."
